query.value:
SELECT 
id, "name", 
slug, 
created_at - interval '8 hour'  as created_at, 
updated_at - interval '8 hour'  as updated_at 
from public."Agencies"  
WHERE created_at - interval '8 hour'>  (@{activity('Lookup_Agencies_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_created_at}) 
OR updated_at - interval '8 hour'> (@{activity('Lookup_Agencies_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_updated_at})

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
CASE WHEN max_created_at IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('''',CONVERT(varchar(50), max_created_at),'''')
ELSE '''1990-01-01''' END as max_created_at,
CASE WHEN max_updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('''',CONVERT(varchar(50), max_updated_at),'''')
ELSE '''1990-01-01''' END as max_updated_at
 FROM(SELECT MAX(FORMAT(created_at,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) as max_created_at,  
				MAX(FORMAT(updated_at,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) as max_updated_at 
		FROM stg."Agencies") a

SELECT id, 
service_unit, 
service_qty, 
service_rate, 
service_cost, 
bid_id, 
service_item_id, 
original_service_qty, 
original_service_rate, 
original_service_cost, 
original_service_category, 
original_service, 
original_service_unit,
created_at - interval '8 hour'  as created_at, 
updated_at - interval '8 hour'  as updated_at 
from public."Bid_Items" 
WHERE created_at - interval '8 hour'>  (@{activity('Lookup_Bid_Items_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_created_at})
OR updated_at - interval '8 hour'> (@{activity('Lookup_Bid_Items_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_updated_at})

query.value:
SELECT
  id,
  bid_number,
  bid_type,
  bid_status,
  bid_date,
  bid_version,
  bid_total_cost,
  region,
  currency,
  queued_bid_id,
  vendor_id,
  project_id,
  import_key,
  original_client_name,
  original_agency_name,
  original_brand_name,
  original_project_name,
  original_project_number,
  original_bid_number,
  original_supplier_name,
  original_bid_type,
  original_bid_status,
  original_raw_bid_status,
  original_bid_date,
  original_bid_version,
  original_bid_total_cost,
  original_region,
  original_raw_region,
  original_name,
  original_document_id,
  original_document_parsed,
  original_doc_parser_upload_id,
  original_doc_parser_template,
  original_currency,
  pdf,
  created_at - interval '8 hour'  as created_at, 
  updated_at - interval '8 hour'  as updated_at 
FROM public."Bids"
WHERE created_at - interval '8 hour'>  (@{activity('Lookup_Bids_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_created_at})
OR updated_at - interval '8 hour'> (@{activity('Lookup_Bids_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_updated_at})

SELECT
id, 
project_name, 
project_number, 
project_type, 
details, 
description, 
delivery_date, 
budget_rate, 
currency, 
image, 
files, 
meta_data, 
sustainability, 
brand_id, 
agency_id, 
region,

created_at - interval '8 hour'  as created_at, 
updated_at - interval '8 hour'  as updated_at 
FROM public."Projects"
WHERE created_at - interval '8 hour'>  (@{activity('Lookup_Projects_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_created_at})
OR updated_at - interval '8 hour'> (@{activity('Lookup_Projects_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_updated_at})

SELECT
  id,
  client_name,
  agency_name,
  brand_name,
  project_name,
  project_number,
  bid_number,
  supplier_name,
  bid_type,
  raw_bid_status,
  bid_date,
  bid_version,
  bid_total_cost,
  raw_region,
  "name",
  document_id,
  document_parsed,
  doc_parser_upload_id,
  doc_parser_template,
  approved,
  currency,
  vendor_id,
  project_id,
  region,
  bid_status,
created_at - interval '8 hour'  as created_at, 
updated_at - interval '8 hour'  as updated_at 
FROM public."Queued_Bids"
WHERE created_at - interval '8 hour'>  (@{activity('Lookup_Queued_Bids_MaxDate').output.firstRow.max_created_at})
